content.question: Assume the marginal propensity to consume is 0.75. What will happen if government spending increases by $100 billion?

choices.label: Real output will increase by a maximum of $75 billion.
Real output will increase by a maximum of $100 billion.
Real output will increase by a maximum of $175 billion.
Real output will increase by a maximum of $300 billion.
Real output will increase by a maximum of $400 billion.

content.answer: Real output will increase by a maximum of $400 billion.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
